awd_titl_txt: Research Experiences for Undergraduates in Molecular        Physics at SRI
awd_abstract_narration: The Molecular Physics Laboratory (MPL) at SRI                              International will become a site for the National Science                       Foundation's Research Experience for Undergraduates (REU)                       program.  The REU program provides talented undergraduates in                   science, mathematics, and engineering the opportunity to                        participate in active research projects during the summer.                      The MPL has developed a world-wide reputation for its                           fundamental and applied research in collisional and radiative                   processes involving ions, atoms, and small molecules.  This                     REU Site Award will permit significant expansion and                            unification of SRI's efforts to contribute to the advancement                   of undergraduate education in science.  SRI is particularly                     interested in providing a research experience for women,                        minorities, and persons with disabilities and will make strong                  efforts to recruit members of those groups.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
